content: crochet pattern shell bandana materials ● 1 skein of light weight yarn 3 ● 4mm hook ● scissors ● tapestry needle abbreviations ● single_crochet - single_crochet ● double_crochet - double_crochet ● slip_stitch - slp st ● chain - chain ● granny cluster- gc ● shell- shell instructions row 1 chain 6 3 double_crochet in beginning chain stitch chain 2 3 double_crochet into same stitch chain 1 1 double_crochet chain 3 flip tips work ● i used loops & threads soft ombre 2 total granny clusters in row blush/sky blue/mint yarn for this project row 2 7 double_crochet in first space 1 single_crochet into 2nd stitch ● if the middle of row 1 becomes too loose of first s row gc 7 double_crochet in next space 1 single_crochet into pull the tail to tighten gc 7 double_crochet in last space chain 1 1 double_crochet chain 3 flip work ● make sure your gauge is not too tight when doing the straps or it will be a pain 3 total shells in row in the butt to crochet into row 3 3 double_crochet into first space 3 double_crochet into 4th stitch of second s row shell 3 double_crochet into next shell chain 2 3 double_crochet into same stitch 3 double_crochet into next shell 3 double_crochet into last space between edge of work and last row s shell chain 1 1 double_crochet chain 3 flip work 6 total granny clusters in row more times 3 double_crochet into last space chain 1 1 double_crochet chain row 4 7 double_crochet in empty space 1 single_crochet into 2nd 3 flip work stitch of gc repeat 6 more times chain 1 1 double_crochet chain 3 flip work 22 total granny clusters in
